AwsSecurityFindingTitle: IAM principals should not have IAM inline policies that allow decryption actions on all KMS keys
AwsSecurityFindingDescription: Checks whether the inline policies embedded in your IAM principals (Role/User/Group) allow the AWS Key Management Service (KMS) decryption actions on all KMS keys. This control fails if kms:Decrypt or kms:ReEncryptFrom actions are allowed on all KMS keys in an inline policy.
AwsSecurityFindingTypes: ["Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards"]

AwsSecurityFindingTitle: VPCs should be configured with an interface endpoint for Systems Manager
AwsSecurityFindingDescription: This control checks whether a virtual private cloud (VPC) that you manage has an interface VPC endpoint for Systems Manager. The control fails if the VPC doesn't have an interface VPC endpoint for Systems Manager. This control evaluates resources in a single account.
AwsSecurityFindingTypes: ["Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards"]
AwsSecurityFindingProductFields: {"RelatedAWSResources:0/name":"securityhub-vpc-endpoint-enabled-ssm-b58c256d","RelatedAWSResources:0/type":"AWS::Config::ConfigRule","aws/securityhub/ProductName":"Security Hub","aws/securityhub/CompanyName":"AWS","aws/securityhub/annotation":"This VPC does not use a VPC endpoint for service ssm.","Resources:0/Id":"arn:aws:ec2:ap-south-1:072643944673:vpc/vpc-0e406facaca7400d3","aws/securityhub/FindingId":"arn:aws:securityhub:ap-south-1::product/aws/securityhub/arn:aws:securityhub:ap-south-1:072643944673:security-control/EC2.57/finding/6825a072-54dc-4ddd-a639-f0be761b2cbe"}
